alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 27 at 7:11PM MST until May 28 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM MST /10 AM to 10 PM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest of winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Coconino County, Yavapai County mountains including Prescott, Navajo County, and Apache County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM MST /10 AM to 10 PM MDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Patchy blowing dust is also possible over the lower elevations of northeast Arizona including portions of Highway 89 from Flagstaff to Page, and Highway 191 from Chinle to Rock Point.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
